definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: prob. after-growth, after-math , i.e. spring-crop (cf. GASm:12 Proph. i. 109);—only (2 t.) Am 7:1, [[בִּתְחִלַּת עֲלוֹת הַלָָּקֶשׁ וְהִנֵּה]] :[[לֶקֶשׁ אַחַר נִּזֵּי הַמֶּלֶח]].—> Other interpr. are: late-rain growth (fr. [[מַלְקוֹשׁ]] q.v.), Hoffm:ZAW iii. (1883) 116; leaf-and-herb-gathering in spring, We after Klein:ZPV iv. 1881, 83; Anderlind:viii. 1886, 62.
